en.title: FE Welcomes VIP QP Wearer, Governor of Khon Kaen, Mr Manit Wattanasen! Mr Wattanasen Was The Guest of Honour at FE's Event at Khon Kaen on Friday 9th January 2009.
en.content:
FE Welcomes VIP QP Wearer, Governor of Khon Kaen, Mr Manit Wattanasen!
Mr Wattanasen Was The Guest of Honour at FE's Event at Khon Kaen on Friday 9th January 2009.
